Title: Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
Director: Kenji Nagasaki, Hitomi Ezoe, Saka Ikeda
Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Ken'ichi Ogata, Kaito Ishikawa, Yuki Kaji
Plot: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?
